stories.title: Show HN: Collect user feedback via Loom (No extension required)
Effective Tips for Context Switching (2019) [for mere mortals]
Reverse engineering Russian IRA tactics through network analysis

stories.text:
Interested in learning more about dealing with the inevitability of context switching from fellow HN readers.

So far, the only article I've found that goes into some depth and offers practical advice is at [1] and it goes:

  Sometimes context switching is inevitable. Instead of fighting it, let’s explore ways to make the most of it. Broken focus is inevitable. The goal of all of this will be to get our brains into that same frame of mind when we were most productive, as quickly as possible.
Keen on hearing other tips and/or being pointed to similar resources.

[1] https://www.phase2technology.com/blog/effective-tips-for-context-switching
